duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide expertise in Windows on-prem and cloud services including active directory domains, Azure, Office 365, and Exchange.
Install and support WiFi access points, connectivity, and authentication.
Provide expertise with Cisco Meraki, Dell, and Brocade switches. Ability to program switchports, access control lists, VLANs, routing, and security.
Provide expertise in VMWare vSphere 7 including the provisioning and management of virtual machines, networking, fault tolerance, and storage.

education_certification.credential:
Minimum of AD degree with minimum of 6 years experience performing Data Center operations support
CCNA or MCSE or VCP certification required
